verbs.description: [ARG1: asian stocks] [V: mixed] [ARGM-TMP: after] imf downgrades economic outlook asian markets are mixed after the imf downgraded its economic outlook citing rising interest rates and mounting tensions over trade keeping score japan benchmark nikkei 225 fell 1 1 percent to 23 513 20 hong kong hang seng added 0 3 percent to 26 289 24 the shanghai composite index recovered from early losses to gain 0 1 percent to 2 719 41 after tumbling 3 7 percent on monday australia s&p asx 200 gave up 1 0 percent to 6 040 60 stocks rose in taiwan and thailand but fell in indonesia and singapore markets in south korea were closed for a national holiday invesco beijing google columbus day apple mexico zhu huani washington new york mercantile exchange korea london european commission japan mike pompeo taiwan mizuho bank britain brazil president donald trump italy russell imf wells fargo luigi di maio asia france workers party new york brent crude south korea crown castle international europe canada australia international monetary fund bali singapore u s paypal amazon minister wang yi wall street journal thailand world bank analyst salesforce china jair bolsonaro netflix official global payments us south china sea kristina hooper hang seng germany hong kong microsoft indonesia
